title: Bigboy's Chew Toy
content:
Main Hand OnlyTopple

Often mistaken for a relic of the wizard Bigby's creation, this staff was, ironically, made as a bite stick for Bigbyâ€˜s dog, Bigboy.

Quarterstaff Versatile

Bigboy's Chew Toy is one of the Quartestaff Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Bigboy's Chew Toy is a unique weapon that allows the user to cast Enlarge on itself. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.). Characters need to master certain Proficiency
